document.full_text: france will bolster security at home and around its assets abroad to guard against reprisals after the death of al qaeda chief osama bin laden, prime minister francois fillon said on tuesday.
document.title: france bolsters anti-terror measures at home, abroad
lines_and_colors: france will bolster security at home and around its assets abroad to guard against reprisals after the death of al qaeda chief osama bin laden, prime minister francois fillon said on tuesday.
